svg:
<svg width="1920" height="1080" viewBox="0 0 1920 1080" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background Sky -->
  <rect id="svg_1" width="1920" height="1080" fill="#BCE4F9" />
  
  <!-- Clouds Group -->
  <g id="svg_2">
    <path d="M200 200C200 170 240 150 280 150C300 120 360 120 380 150C420 150 460 170 460 200H200Z" fill="white" opacity="0.8" />
    <path d="M1500 150C1500 120 1540 100 1580 100C1600 70 1660 70 1680 100C1720 100 1760 120 1760 150H1500Z" fill="white" opacity="0.8" />
    <path d="M800 100C800 80 830 60 860 60C880 40 920 40 940 60C970 60 1000 80 1000 100H800Z" fill="white" opacity="0.6" />
  </g>

  <!-- Illustration Placeholder (Hills and Flowers) -->
  <g id="svg_3" clip-path="url(#clip_0)">
    <defs>
      <clipPath id="clip_0">
        <rect width="1920" height="600" y="480" />
      </clipPath>
    </defs>
    <!-- Fallback simple shapes to represent the hill if image is missing -->
    <path d="M0 1080V700C300 650 600 600 960 620C1320 640 1620 600 1920 550V1080H0Z" fill="#88B04B" opacity="0.5" />
  </g>

  <!-- Header Text: Hello -->
  <text id="svg_4" x="960" y="220" text-anchor="middle" fill="#FFEB3B" font-family="KyoboHandwriting2020" font-size="120" font-weight="bold">Hello</text>
  
  <!-- Header Text: Spring -->
  <text id="svg_5" x="960" y="340" text-anchor="middle" fill="#4A90E2" font-family="KyoboHandwriting2020" font-size="180" font-weight="bold">Spring</text>

  <!-- Descriptive Text Split for constraints -->
  <text id="svg_6" x="960" y="420" text-anchor="middle" fill="#FFFFFF" font-family="NotoSansKR-Medium" font-size="32">Spring is a</text>
  <text id="svg_7" x="960" y="465" text-anchor="middle" fill="#FFFFFF" font-family="NotoSansKR-Medium" font-size="32">season full of</text>
  <text id="svg_8" x="960" y="510" text-anchor="middle" fill="#FFFFFF" font-family="NotoSansKR-Medium" font-size="32">beauty & wonder</text>
</svg>
